question: Saksham (Sanrakshan Kshamta Mahotsav) is an annual flagship event under the aegis of which ministry?
option1: Ministry of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises
explanation: Saksham (Sanrakshan Kshamta Mahotsav) is an annual flagship event of Petroleum Conservation Research Association (PCRA) under the aegis of Ministry of Petroleum & Natural Gas, Govt. of India.
